Before joining the University of Sheffield, he held postdoctoral positions at Imperial College London, UK and Tsinghua University, China. He received a PhD degree from Tsinghua University, China and a B.Eng. degree from Xi'an Jiaotong University, China. Research interests Dr. Chen is interested in various areas of Computer Vision and Machine Learning including human analysis, detection and retrieval.
